name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve feed and Remove Ads - Youtube

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove Ads and Improve recommendations feed Easily by removing already watched and uninteresting videos from Youtube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension improves the YouTube experience in multiple ways.

- Allows you to seamlessly watch YouTube videos without watching Ads(both Video and Hover)
- There can be videos we might have already watched through some other account or in incognito, that we don't want to see on our YouTube feed repeatedly. This extension allows to easily remove such videos from the feed and also adds them to the watch library so that similar recommendations can be served.
- Allows to easily remove uninterested videos in a single click
